quote: I send handwritten letters to expired listings every Tuesday, and it still works.
why_clipworthy: Provides a specific, actionable tactic that agents can implement immediately.
suggested_hook: Looking for a new way to generate listings? Try this proven tactic!

quote: Without our health, we have nothing. All these little stressors in life... if your family's healthy, that's all that matters.
why_clipworthy: Touches on personal resilience and the importance of health, resonating with listeners on a human level.
suggested_hook: Why health should be your top priority, even in real estate.
